function.name: book_restaurant
function.description: Allows you to book a restaurant

time.description: Time the restaurant reservation is at e.g. 13:00

day.description: Day of the week the restaurant reservation is on e.g. thursday

people.description: Number of people in the restaurant reservation e.g. 3

name.description: Name of the restaurant e.g. the river bar steakhouse and grill

function.name: search_restaurant
function.description: Allows you to search a restaurant

food.description: Type of food served at the restaurant e.g. modern european

pricerange.description: Price range the restaurant is in e.g. cheap

name.description: Name of the restaurant e.g. jinling noodle bar

area.description: Area the restaurant is located in e.g. centre

function.name: book_hotel
function.description: Allows you to book a hotel

stay.description: The number of days the hotel will be rented for e.g. 4

day.description: The day of the week the hotel will be rented for e.g. friday

people.description: The number of people that will be at the hotel e.g. 2

name.description: The name of the hotel e.g. acorn guest house

function.name: search_hotel
function.description: Allows you to search a hotel

name.description: The name of the hotel e.g. hamilton lodge

area.description: The area the hotel is located in e.g. north

parking.description: Whether the hotel offers free parking e.g. yes

pricerange.description: What the price range of how expensive the hotel is e.g. moderate

stars.description: The number of stars the hotel has e.g. 4

internet.description: Whether or not the hotel has free internet e.g. yes

type.description: Whether to reserve a hotel or guesthouse. e.g. guesthouse

function.name: book_attraction
function.description: Allows you to book a attraction

function.name: search_attraction
function.description: Allows you to search a attraction

type.description: The type or theme of the attraction e.g. boat

name.description: The name of the attraction e.g. sheep's green and lammas land park fen causeway

area.description: The area where the attraction is e.g. centre

function.name: book_train
function.description: Allows you to book a train

people.description: The number of people or seats to book on the train e.g. 3

trainID.description: ID for the train the tickets are for e.g. TR2048

function.name: search_train
function.description: Allows you to search a train

leaveAt.description: Time the train will leave from the departure area e.g. 08:45

destination.description: Destination area of the train e.g. cambridge

day.description: Day of the week the train will run e.g. tuesday

arriveBy.description: Time the train will arrive at the destination e.g. 12:30

departure.description: Departure area of the train e.g. london liverpool street
